item.title: Florida Everglades Airboat Tour and Wild Florida Admission with Optional Lunch
item.description: Escape to the wilderness of the Florida Everglades from Orlando on this airboat adventure. This exciting nature tour includes admission to the Wild Florida Airboats and Wildlife Park— with over 200 different animals like lemurs, sloths, zebras, watusi cattle, bobcats and more. Choose from two airboat durations and upgrade to the half-day tour and enjoy a delicious barbeque lunch at the Chomp House Grill, plus an alligator souvenir.

image.alt: Florida Everglades Airboat Tour and Wild Florida Admission with Optional Lunch

item.title: Rock Springs 2-Hour Glass Bottom Guided Kayak Eco Tour
item.description: A good choice for nature lovers, this tour takes you into a unique part of Rock Springs Run known as "Emerald Cut.” The first part of the tour is an upstream paddle through calm waters and overhead tree canopy, with stops to hop off your clear kayak and into the fresh spring water. Keep your eyes peeled for for fish, turtles, birds, small alligators, and more.

image.alt: Rock Springs 2-Hour Glass Bottom Guided Kayak Eco Tour

item.title: Fun Spot America Theme Parks - Orlando
item.description: Dedicate a day to non-stop entertainment for the whole family at Fun Spot America! Choose from Fun Spot’s Orlando or Kissimmee locations, and enjoy the ease of free parking and fast access with your single-day pass. Fill your day with thrilling rides, go-karts racing and arcade games (own expense). Even the smallest family members with have options like the Kiddie Coaster and the mini fun house!

image.alt: Fun Spot America Theme Parks - Orlando

item.title: 90 minute Everglades Airboat Tour near Orlando Florida
item.description: The Florida Everglades can be a dangerous place to adventure on your own. This guided tour of the area by airboat allows you to enjoy the awesome views of alligators and other wildlife without feeling threatened. Along with live commentary from your guide. Smaller boats also mean no crowds or long lines, just a relaxing ride through the swamp.

image.alt: 90 minute Everglades Airboat Tour near Orlando Florida

item.title: Fun Spot America Theme Parks- Kissimmee
item.description: When in Orlando, don’t miss the chance to visit Fun Spot America Kissimmee for a day of thrills and laughs. This family-owned theme park is fun for all ages, with tall roller coasters and arcade games (extra fee). You can race go-karts, ride on a wooden roller-coaster, and check out the Skycoasaters (extra fee).

image.alt: Fun Spot America Theme Parks- Kissimmee

item.title: Glass Bottom Kayak Eco Tour through Rainbow Springs
item.description: Florida is home to a biodiverse ecosystem and one of the best ways to explore is by kayak. Board a glass-bottom kayak with a small group and follow your guide on an eco-tour of Rainbow Springs for unparalleled views of the underwater world. Paddle through nature’s playground and keep your eyes peeled for local wildlife like turtles, alligators, fish, and even otters.

image.alt: Glass Bottom Kayak Eco Tour through Rainbow Springs

item.title: Wizard of OZ Museum tour
item.description: Few people know that one of the only two Wizard of Oz Museums is right in Central Florida. Take advantage of this ticket to explore a hidden gem located near NASA and Cocoa Beach. Wander around the site where you’ll find an assortment of comic books, maps, dolls, collectibles, toys, posters, and other Wizard of Oz themed memorabilia. The museum even has original props and costumes from the movie.

image.alt: Wizard of OZ Museum tour

item.title: WonderWorks Orlando
item.description: Go wild with some mind-boggling fun at WonderWorks Orlando. This admission ticket gives you fast-access to the attraction with your pre-purchased ticket. Revel in a full day of entertainment that brings together the scientific, the mysterious and the kooky. Choose your favorite activities from among 100 exhibitions, including earthquake simulators, a bubble lab, a gyro and more. Upgrade to the VIP Combo which includes the Outta Control Dinner Show..

image.alt: WonderWorks Orlando

item.title: Orlando Tree Trek Adventure Park
item.description: Take the excitement of your Orlando vacation up a level with a tree top adventure. This ropes course is a series of aerial adventures with cargo nets, swinging logs, ziplines, trapeze swings and other obstacles to challenge yourself. Every level of climbing expertise will find something to test their skills, on a thrilling course set from 10 to 50 feet (3 to 15 meters) above the ground.

image.alt: Orlando Tree Trek Adventure Park

item.title: The Outta Control Magic Comedy Dinner Show in Orlando
item.description: Experience a marvelous mix of magic and comedy at the unforgettable Outta Control Dinner Show in Orlando. Head to the venue and grab your reserved seat for a 90-minute improv comedy performance full of energy, interaction and fun. While you watch, enjoy pizza, salad and soft drinks. Allow yourself to be swept away by the incredible performance that’ll have you rolling in the aisles! Upgrade to include admission to WonderWorks amusement park or an exciting Lazer-tag game.

image.alt: The Outta Control Magic Comedy Dinner Show in Orlando

item.title: Wild Florida Drive-Thru Safari and Gator Park Admission
item.description: Swap crowded bus tours for a much more intimate safari experience—a self-guided tour where you can drive your own vehicle through the Wild Florida Drive-Thru Safari Park. During the ride, look out for over 100 animals—including zebras, white-tailed deer, and bison. There's also a huge pond that's home to alligators, and an area where you can hand-feed giraffes.

image.alt: Wild Florida Drive-Thru Safari and Gator Park Admission

item.title: Kennedy Space Center with Transport from Orlando and Kissimmee
item.description: Embark on the ultimate space adventure at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center, where you can explore a range of exciting tour options. Walk beneath the largest rocket ever flown, meet a veteran NASA astronaut, and get up close with Space Shuttle Atlantis. Experience the thrilling Shuttle Launch Experience and discover interactive exhibits that bring space exploration to life. For an enhanced visit, upgrade to include a 30-minute airboat ride on the St. Johns River or opt for the Ultimate Space Experience, featuring lunch with an astronaut and an exclusive bus tour. Don't miss this unforgettable journey into space!

image.alt: Kennedy Space Center with Transport from Orlando and Kissimmee

item.title: 2 HR Interactive Walking Ghost Tour in Downtown Orlando
item.description: Swap crowded theme parks for a more unusual activity in Orlando—a ghost-themed walking tour in the historic downtown area. Find out secret stories of paranormal activity that you likely wouldn’t uncover alone, and try out professional ghost hunting equipment too. As well as seeing the exterior of haunted places, this tour takes you inside buildings too.

image.alt: 2 HR Interactive Walking Ghost Tour in Downtown Orlando

item.title: Treetop Express Zip Line Tour with 5 Zip Line Flights & 2 Sky Bridges Included
item.description: This is an excellent pick for thrill-seekers. Secure your entry in advance to a safe and professional zip-lining facility—the Treetop Express. Rather than only experiencing the buzz of zip lining once, the package includes five zipline flights and two Skywalk Bridges. No need to worry if it’s your first time—an introduction and practice session are included, and you can start slow and build your way up.

image.alt: Treetop Express Zip Line Tour with 5 Zip Line Flights & 2 Sky Bridges Included

item.title: Glass Bottom Kayak Tours of Silver Springs
item.description: See some of central Florida’s most spectacular scenery—and increase your chances of spotting wildlife—on this small-group, clear kayaking tour of Silver Springs State Park. Pick from multiple tour times and make your own way to the park, where you’ll meet your guide and get acquainted with your kayaks. Then, set off into the scenery. Learn more about the area as you go, and keep your eyes peeled for manatees, monkeys, alligators, and more.

image.alt: Glass Bottom Kayak Tours of Silver Springs

item.title: 30-Minute Airboat Ride, Lunch, Gem Mining and Park Admission
item.description: Venture beyond the theme parks, and see some of the Orlando area’s top attractions in one day, with this convenient, cost-effective package. Make your own way to the departure point in Kissimmee, hop aboard an airboat, and zip through the area’s waterways in search of alligators. Then, visit a Native American living history museum, and discover an interactive gem-mining experience. Finally, sit down to enjoy a hearty barbecue lunch.

image.alt: 30-Minute Airboat Ride, Lunch, Gem Mining and Park Admission

item.title: One-Hour Airboat Ride Near Orlando
item.description:
Welcome to our enchanted 32-acre park, where adventure awaits around every corner. Explore the lighted brick pathways that wind along the beautiful lake, surrounded by nature's wonders.
Get up-close and personal with Florida's favorite reptiles on an airboat adventure.
Immerse yourself in the vibrant beauty of native butterflies, wildlife, and plants in Lily's Butterfly Garden.
Embark on a mining adventure as you sift through buckets of soil, uncovering semi-precious gems, fossils, and crystals.
Witness our living history museum and learn from descendants of the Jororo Tribe, “The Forgotten Tribe of Florida” and discover a primitive way of living at our authentic Native American Village.
Wrap up your visit with a delicious lakeside meal at Boggy Bottoms BBQ. Join us and escape to nature!
* For 1-hour tours, please arrive 30 minutes prior to your reservation.

image.alt: One-Hour Airboat Ride Near Orlando

item.title: Admission Ticket to Museum of Illusions Orlando
item.description: The Museum of Illusions is a popular attraction with over 50 interactive exhibits that teach you about optical illusions and make great Instagram-worthy photo opportunities. By securing admission in advance, there’s no need to worry about tickets selling out on the day or long lines, and you can get inside quicker. Highlights include the chance to “shrink” to miniature size in the Ames Room, and the gravity-defying Reverse Room.

image.alt: Admission Ticket to Museum of Illusions Orlando

item.title: 30-Minute Airboat Ride near Orlando
item.description: Experience Florida’s wild wetlands on an exciting, family-friendly airboat ride! This boat tour winds through the mossy cypress swamps in the Central Everglades south of Orlando. While onboard, enjoy lively commentary from a native guide as you admire the lush, woody shoreline and spot local wildlife like lurking gators.

image.alt: 30-Minute Airboat Ride near Orlando

item.title: Gypsy Gold Horse Farm Tour
item.description: Discover the unexpected history of America's first Gypsy Vanner Horses on this tour of Gypsy Gold Horse Farm. Wander past trees lined with Spanish moss en route to the stables, where you can meet Gypsy Vanner Horses, famed for their beauty. This tour provides an introduction to a niche bit of Florida history and provides information about an uncommon breed of horses.

image.alt: Gypsy Gold Horse Farm Tour

item.title: 1-Hour "Sky High" Zip Line Adventure Tour with 3 Zip Line Flights Included
item.description: This ziplining adventure is more than just an exhilarating experience—it also offers incredible views of the Sky High Canyon from 155 feet (47 meters) above the ground. Rather than being limited to just one zipline—this package gives you access to three different ziplines, including a wild ride over Gator Lake.

image.alt: 1-Hour "Sky High" Zip Line Adventure Tour with 3 Zip Line Flights Included

item.title: Cypress Forest: Guided Nature Kayak Eco-Tour
item.description: Just outside Orlando you’ll find Shingle Creek, the headwaters to the Florida Everglades. The quiet waters beneath a forest of cypress trees are the perfect spot to kayak, even if it’s your first time. This guided tour will take you through the habitat of Floridian wildlife, including spoonbills, hawks, frogs, egret…even alligators.

image.alt: Cypress Forest: Guided Nature Kayak Eco-Tour

item.title: 16 miles Private Helicopter Day Tour over Fun Spot
item.description: Experience Orlando in an unusual way: from the window of a helicopter. Sit back and enjoy an eight- to 10-minute flight over highlights such as The Big Orange, Old Town, Fun Spot, and Kissimmee city. Learn about the development of the area and its history through your pilot's commentary and snap epic aerial photos as you travel.

image.alt: 16 miles Private Helicopter Day Tour over Fun Spot

item.title: Clear Kayak or Paddleboard Manatee Adventure
item.description: Located north of Orlando, Silver Springs is a popular spot for boaters and other on-water riders to spot manatees floating leisurely through the crystal waters. Get close to these mammals and other wildlife including monkeys and turtles on a clear paddle board or kayak tour. Take an adventure into the springs on your choice of a clear kayak or paddle board, letting your transparent watercraft give you a fantastic view beneath the surface.

image.alt: Clear Kayak or Paddleboard Manatee Adventure
